issue.title: Issues attempting to replay Gazebo log file

content.raw:
As jerryandt mentioned, you can filter your log file to reduce its size. 

We are working on scoring scripts [here](#!/osrf/srcsim/branch/score). You can run your log file through these scripts to get a sense of your final score.

**NOTE** The above scripts are under development. You should also assume that the score/error produced by these scripts do *not* reflect the final scores that you will receive. Final determination of scoring is done by NASA, with help from OSRF.
content.html:
As jerryandt mentioned, you can filter your log file to reduce its size.

We are working on scoring scripts here. You can run your log file through these scripts to get a sense of your final score.

NOTE The above scripts are under development. You should also assume that the score/error produced by these scripts do not reflect the final scores that you will receive. Final determination of scoring is done by NASA, with help from OSRF.
